Publications by eHealth-Hub Cancer Researchers in 2022

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
authors = c("Mark Lawler", "Aedin Culhane", "Ruth Clifford")
year="2022"
my_query <- paste("{",paste(sapply(authors, paste0, "[AU] "), collapse ="OR "), "}","AND", year, "[PDAT]")
x=ReadPubMed(my_query)
print(x)
```
